game_description: Mutant-Jay is an adrenaline pumping survival game that test your physical endurance to the limits. You play as a mutant bird with an insatiable hunger. In order to stay alive, you have to constant look for creatures to eat. Controls are super simple. Player move by flapping its wings. Flapping is achieved by doing half squats or hopping on the spot. Once in the air, the player will glide in the direction it is facing. This is a game that will provide the player with an intense aerobic workout. Key Features: - Exercise while gaming. Get an aerobic workout while playing the game. - Challenge yourself. Test your endurance and challenge your past records in terms of number of creatures eaten or how long you can stay alive. - Immersive experience. Experience mobility through the eyes of a bird in flight.
